snippet: Cleveland’s Kyrie Irving, the top choice in the 2011 N.B.A. draft, is a top candidate for rookie of the year honors.
abstract: Cleveland Cavaliers guard Kyrie Irving, the top choice in the 2011 NBA draft, is a top candidate for rookie of the year honors.
lead_paragraph: Cleveland’s Kyrie Irving, the top choice in the 2011 N.B.A. draft, is a top candidate for rookie of the year honors.

headline.seo: Kyrie Irving of Cavaliers Is Exceeding Expectations
headline.main: Cavs’ Irving, a No. 1 Pick, Is Exceeding Expectations
headline.print_headline: At the Point, the Cavs’ Irving Is Exceeding Expectations
